name: Ice Hot!
description:
Ice Hot! is a small but very difficult technique based platformer. The game is built around the temperature release mechanic, which allows the player to release short bursts of extreme hot or cold.

In Ice Hot! you must master the temperature release technique in order to properly navigate an environment of water platforms, regular platforms, vertical platforms and moving platforms... among other things.

Estimated time to complete: 30min - 1 hour. 

Any and all feedback would be greatly appreciated!
